name: NovaBay Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
description: NovaBay Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is a biotechnology company focused on developing and commercializing innovative anti-infective products for the treatment of eye care and other diseases. Founded in 2000 and headquartered in Richmond, California, the company has made significant strides in bringing advanced therapeutic solutions to market. NovaBay is known for its proprietary product, Avenova, which is an FDA-cleared solution designed to help manage blepharitis, a common eyelid condition. Avenova utilizes NovaBay's patented NVC-422 technology, which is based on a novel approach to the treatment of infections. The company is committed to addressing unmet medical needs through its research and development efforts. NovaBay also explores opportunities in other therapeutic areas, leveraging its expertise in anti-infective agents. With a focus on patient care and safety, NovaBay aims to enhance the quality of life for those suffering from chronic eye conditions and infections. The company continually seeks to expand its product pipeline and improve existing therapies, positioning itself as a leader in the ophthalmic market.
